extensionAttribute.description: returns CFBundleShortVersionString string from JamfConnect JCDaemon
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
JamfConnectJCDaemonVertion=""
if [ -f /Library/Application\ Support/JamfConnect/JCDaemon.app/Contents/Info.plist ] then JamfConnectJCDaemonVertion=$(defaults read /Library/Application\ Support/JamfConnect/JCDaemon.app/Contents/Info.plist CFBundleShortVersionString 2>/dev/null) fi
echo "<result>$JamfConnectJCDaemonVertion</result>"
exit 0
